alert.note: Alert for Texas (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 10:38PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Texas, northern Hansford and eastern Sherman Counties through 1115 PM CDT... At 1038 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles south of Goodwell, or 18 miles south of Guymon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Texas, northern Hansford and eastern Sherman Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
